name: Joint Training Exercises
option1: The proposing player may activate one of their opponents ships once each round. They may not attack or bombard during that activation.
option2: Each player may activate one of their opponents planets once each round. All command is spent by the owning player. Any effects are treated as applying to the player activating the planet.

name: Open Border Policy
option1: When either player activates a planet the other player also receives the effects of that activation.

name: Border Control Division
option1: Spacecraft may only move between adjacent assets.
option2: If a spacecraft moves to a different asset it may not be activated again that round.

name: General Massive Exports
option1: All spacecraft cost one fewer construction to construct.
option2: All megastructures cost one fewer construction to construct.

name: Disarmament Commission
option1: You and your opponent can only move one ship each round.
option2: You and your opponent can only activate one planet per round.

name: Peace Sanctions
option1: When either player attacks using a spacecraft they lose all remaining command.
option2: After the first time the proposing player's opponent attacks each round, the proposing player may activate a spacecraft to attack without spending command.
